1: 'jigs byed <mistake>pa// rdo</mistake> rje grags pa <mistake>ro</mistake> <mistake>rje'i</mistake> <mistake>snying//sgyu</mistake> 'phrul rdo rje gsus po <mistake>che//rdo</mistake> <mistake>rje'i</mistake> skye gnas rdo <mistake>rje'i</mistake> <mistake>dbang//rdo</mistake> rje snying po mkha' <mistake>'dra ba//mi</mistake> <mistake>g.yo</mistake> <mistake>ra l</mistake> pa gcig bsgyings <mistake>pa//glang</mistake> chen lpags pa
2: rlon pa <mistake>'chang//drag</mistake> <mistake>tshen</mistake> <mistake>ha</mistake> <mistake>thA</mistake> zhes sgrogs <mistake>pa//hUI</mistake> <mistake>hIi</mistake> zhes sgrogs 'jigs par <mistake>byed//gda</mistake> mo <mistake>tshen</mistake> po <mistake>gd</mistake> rgyangs <mistake>can//rdo</mistake> rje <mistake>gda</mistake> mo cher sgrogs <mistake>pa// rdo</mistake> rje sems dpa' sems dpa' <mistake>che//rdo</mistake> rje rgyal
3: po bde ba <mistake>che//rdo</mistake> <mistake>rjeg</mistake> <mistake>tum</mistake> po dga' ba <mistake>cshe// rdo</mistake> rje <mistake>+huM</mistake> mdzad <mistake>hAM</mistake> <mistake>g</mistake> <mistake>gzugs//rdo</mistake> rje <mistake>mda'</mistake> yi mtshon 'chang <mistake>ba//rdo</mistake> rje ral gris gcod mdzad <mistake>pa//rdo</mistake> rje kun <mistake>'chang</mistake> rdo rje <mistake>can //rdo</mistake> rje gcig <mistake>zu</mistake> <mistake>g.yul</mistake> sel <mistake>ba//</mistake>
4: <mistake>do</mistake> rje 'bar ba <mistake>gtcig</mistake> <mistake>pa'i</mistake> <mistake>mig /mgo</mistake> skyes rdo rje 'bar ba <mistake>ste//rdo</mistake> rje 'bebs pa 'bebs pa <mistake>tshe//mig</mistake> brgya pa ste rdo <mistake>rje'i</mistake> <mistake>mig /rdo</mistake> <mistake>rje'i</mistake> spu ni myug gu <mistake>lus//rd</mistake> rje spu ni lus gcig <mistake>pu// rdo</mistake> <mistake>rjertse</mistake> mo sen mos
5: <mistake>brtams//do</mistake> rje snying po <mistake>bags</mistake> pa <mistake>mkhrigs//rdo</mistake> rje phreng thogs dpal dang ldan // rdo rje rgyan gyis brgyan pa <mistake>ste//gad</mistake> rgyangs <mistake>hA</mistake> <mistake>hrA</mistake> nges par <mistake>sgrogs//yi</mistake> ge drug pa rdo rje 'i <mistake>sgra//'jam</mistake> pa'i dbyangs ni
6: sgra che <mistake>ba//'jig</mistake> rten <mistake>sum</mistake> gcig sgra chen <mistake>po//nam</mistake> <mistake>mkha'i</mistake> khams kyi mthar thug <mistake>sgra//sgra</mistake> dang ldan pa rnams kyi <mistake>mtshog /me</mistake> <mistake>long</mistake> lta <mistake>bu'i</mistake> ye shes kyi tshigs <mistake>su</mistake> bcad pa rkang pa dang <mistake>bcas pa</mistake> bcu <mistake>o///</mistake>
7: yang dag bdag med de bzhin <mistake>nyid//yang</mistake> dag mtha' ste yi ge <mistake>med //stong</mistake> nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog <mistake>ste//zab</mistake> cing rgya che <mistake>sgr</mistake> sgrogs <mistake>pa//chos</mistake> kyi dung ste sgra chen <mistake>po//chos</mistake> kyi <mistake>gadna</mistake> <mistake>wi</mistake> sgra bo <mistake>che//rab</mistake> tu mi <mistake>gan</mistake>
8: mya <mistake>gan</mistake> <mistake>'nas//phyogs</mistake> <mistake>bcu'i</mistake> chos kyi <mistake>rdga</mistake> bo <mistake>che//gzugs</mistake> med gzugs ldan dam pa <mistake>ste//sna</mistake> tshogs gzugs can yid rang <mistake>bzhin// gzugs</mistake> <mistake>nams</mistake> thams cad snang ba'i dpal // gzugs <mistake>brnan</mistake>
